title: Who do you like the least in BlackPink? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t necessarily dislike her, I just dislike the way that YG treats her. (This could be any member lol) But the member I ‘dislike’ is… drumroll please Jennie Kim. I dislike the way YG markets her compared to the other members. She’s always centre, always wearing the nicest clothes, and always gets the best things before the others. Take Solo for example. It’s a bop ngl, (but it’s kinda rushed…) however it’s slightly boring because YG didn’t give Jennie enough time to prepare it properly. But my other pet peeve is that she got her solo first. A long, long time ago. We’re only getting confirmation of Rosé’s solo being remotely real just now. Nothing for or from Lisa or Jisoo. However, I doubt that Jisoo will even have a solo. I mean we’ve seen from their choreography to start with that YG has his… how do I say this? ‘Favourites’. Or even ‘princesses’. And Jisoo isn’t one of them. Neither is Rosé though sooooo… there is still hope that she’ll get a solo. {allow me to reiterate that i’m not hating on jennie, i love her to bits, she’s just been put on a pedestal by YG and those are some of the things that come with it.} Anyway, thx for reading! Ellie x
